1.6.0.commit_description: Update GROMACS against GROMACS 2021.2 upstream, add GPU CUDA build as part of this test profile rather than prior separate gromacs-gpu.

1.4.0.commit_description: Update against GROMACS 2020.3 upstream to workaround compiler issues on newer distros like Fedora.

1.2.1.commit_description: Add external dependencies that were missing/

1.2.0.commit_description: Update against new GROMACS 2020 upstream, add allow run as root for mpirun.

1.1.1.commit_description: Fix for the run sometimes failing, delete the previous tpr files before running.

1.0.0.commit_description: Been meaning to add this, very similar to existing gromacs-gpu test profile but this test profile only subject to running on CPU.
